snippet: A 2-year-old boy who fell into an exhibit of African wild dogs was killed by the animals, not the fall, the president of the Pittsburgh Zoo said Monday.
abstract: Pittsburgh Zoo president Barbara Baker says that a 2-year-old boy who fell into an exhibit of African wild dogs was killed by the animals, not the fall, as previously reported.
lead_paragraph: A 2-year-old boy who fell into an exhibit of African wild dogs was killed by the animals, not the fall, the president of the Pittsburgh Zoo said Monday.

headline.seo: Dogs Killed Boy Who Fell Into Pittsburgh Zoo Exhibit
headline.main: Pennsylvania: Dogs Killed Boy Who Fell Into Zoo Exhibit
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Dogs Killed Boy Who Fell Into Zoo Exhibit
